issue.subject: Mix-up between predefined extent name and translation
issue.description:
In metadata edition form, there is a mix-up between predefined extent name and translation.

This bug was not found before because the content of those 2 fields are often equals.

A workaround is to change the name of the extent by is translation (text1), but works only on single language plateform.

Bug is to search in ajax.php and FormStereotype.php.
